data.fullContent: Tourism is the act of traveling to a place outside of one's usual geographical boundaries for pleasure or recreation. The term has long been used to refer to international travel, but more recently it has been broadened to include domestic travel by residents within a country. The World Tourism Organization (WTO) defines tourism as "any voyage or trip that has recreation as its main purpose or principle reason, while making use of the commercial provision of services." In the broadest sense, tourists are people who travel in order to experience a particular region, destination, or culture. In this sense, perhaps any human traveler could be categorized as a tourist.
